basics.label: Basics
basics.description: Essential commands every Claude Code user should know

quests.title: Fresh Start
quests.description: Clear your conversation to start fresh
quests.hint: Type /clear when your context feels cluttered

quests.title: Context Crunch
quests.description: Compact your conversation to save context window
quests.hint: Use /compact when the conversation gets long

quests.title: RTFM
quests.description: Open the help menu to see all available commands
quests.hint: Type /help to see what's possible

quests.title: System Check
quests.description: Check your current session status
quests.hint: Type /status to see model, context usage, and more

quests.title: Vim Wizard
quests.description: Toggle vim keybindings in the input
quests.hint: Type /vim if you're a vim user

quests.title: Cost Conscious
quests.description: Check how much this session has cost
quests.hint: Type /cost to see token usage and estimated cost

workflow.label: Workflow
workflow.description: Commands that level up how you work with Claude

quests.title: Multiverse
quests.description: Fork your conversation to explore a different path
quests.hint: Type /fork to branch off without losing your current context

quests.title: Memory Lane
quests.description: View or manage Claude's project memory
quests.hint: Type /memory to see what Claude remembers about your project

quests.title: Code Reviewer
quests.description: Ask Claude to review recent changes
quests.hint: Type /review to get a code review of your staged changes

quests.title: Project Genesis
quests.description: Initialize Claude for a new project
quests.hint: Type /init in a new project to set up CLAUDE.md

quests.title: Continue Mission
quests.description: Resume a previous conversation
quests.hint: Type /resume to pick up where you left off

quests.title: Model Swapper
quests.description: Switch between Claude models mid-conversation
quests.hint: Type /model to switch between Haiku, Sonnet, and Opus

power.label: Power User
power.description: Advanced features most users never discover

quests.title: Plugin Hunter
quests.description: Install a plugin to extend Claude's capabilities
quests.hint: Type /install to add MCP servers, skills, or plugins

quests.title: Gatekeeper
quests.description: View or modify tool permissions
quests.hint: Type /permissions to control what Claude can access

quests.title: Speed Demon
quests.description: Toggle fast mode for quicker responses
quests.hint: Type /fast to toggle faster output from Claude

quests.title: Terminal Tuner
quests.description: Configure terminal integration settings
quests.hint: Type /terminal-setup to optimize your terminal for Claude

quests.title: Config Master
quests.description: Open Claude Code configuration
quests.hint: Type /config to customize Claude Code behavior

quests.title: Identity Check
quests.description: Check or switch your authentication
quests.hint: Type /logout to manage your Claude authentication

mastery.label: Mastery
mastery.description: You're building on top of Claude Code itself

quests.title: Command Crafter
quests.description: Create or manage custom slash commands
quests.hint: Create .claude/commands/ directory with custom prompt files

quests.title: Hook Master
quests.description: Configure hooks that run on Claude Code events
quests.hint: Add hooks to settings.json for SessionStart, UserPromptSubmit, etc.

quests.title: Protocol Engineer
quests.description: Set up or use an MCP server with Claude Code
quests.hint: MCP servers extend Claude with custom tools and data sources

quests.title: Orchestrator
quests.description: Use multiple models in a single session (switch 3+ times)
quests.hint: Switch between Haiku (fast/cheap), Sonnet (balanced), Opus (powerful)

quests.title: Skill Publisher
quests.description: Create and share your own Claude Code skill
quests.hint: Write a SKILL.md and publish to GitHub for others to use
